Our Team

About Us

We are a team of third-year pharmacy students from University of Makati, in collaboration with a fourth-year computer engineering student as our main engineer and developer. Together we are united to make a meaningful impact on patient health through innovative healthcare solutions. Our diverse backgrounds in clinical knowledge, medication therapy, and patient care have allowed us to deeply understand the challenges many patients face — particularly when it comes to medication adherence.

Mission

MediMinder is committed to developing user-friendly medication adherence solutions that improve health outcomes. Through human-centered design, we create reliable and efficient tools that empower patients, support healthcare providers, and drive innovation in medical technology.

Vision

We strive to lead in medication adherence technology by making health management effortless. By continuously improving our solutions, we aim to enhance patient well-being, simplify medication routines, and shape the future of medical device innovation with practical and effective tools.
